name: Mama Duck Adventure
description:
Title: Mama Duck Adventure

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 5+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: 

Mama Duck's ducklings have ran away! Can you help Mama Duck find her little ducklings? Go on an adventure with Mama Duck to find and rescue them!

Instructions: 

Use the arrow keys on the keyboard to move Mama Duck! Left and right arrow keys helps Mama Duck move side to side. Up arrow key makes Mama Duck Jump. Press the 'Enter' Key to start or restart the game.

Game Design Team : Josephine Nilkumhang – Game Designer
